bill.title: Part-Time Federal Employees Equity Act of 2009

subjects.subject: Government operations and politics
Employee benefits and pensions
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Temporary and part-time employment

bill.summary: 2/25/2009--Introduced. Part-Time Federal Employees Equity Act of 2009 - Exempts a federal employee's part-time service performed before April 7, 1986, from proration requirements for purposes of annuity computation under the Civil Service Retirement System.
